title: Ep108 Fingerprint Forensics
description: This week, the gals get their hands on a couple of forensic professionals to give a few "tips" about their craft. Topics include whorls versus swirls, a fatal art store robbery, and a healthy dose of autocannibalism. Pour a glass of Thumbprint Cellars 2015 Gewürztraminer, grab some hand lotion, and tune in for Fingerprint Forensics (featuring Glenn and Eric from Double Loop Podcast).
itunes:author: Wine & Crime Podcast
dc:creator: Wine & Crime Podcast
